subject: Football
Women
Television
lead_paragraph: In the 22 seasons since Gayle Sierens partnered with analyst Dave Rowe on the final Sunday of the 1987 regular season, a woman has not called a single National Football League game.
snippet: In the 22 seasons since Gayle Sierens partnered with analyst Dave Rowe on the final Sunday of the 1987 regular season, a woman has not called a single National Football League game.
